Interpreter¶

Interpreter module

This is a basic interpreter for Daffy assembly code. The interpreter expects lines in the form:

$name: optype([argname=$target.attr | <float value>], ...)
daffy.vm.interpreter.DVM_instruction_run(instruction, scheduler)¶

Parse an instruction and schedule the resulting operation for execution

daffy.vm.interpreter.DVM_line_parse(line)¶

Parse a line of input

daffy.vm.interpreter.DVM_program_run(program, scheduler)¶

Run a Daffy program

exception daffy.vm.interpreter.ParserSyntaxError[source]¶

A syntax error

exception daffy.vm.interpreter.ParserUndefinedState[source]¶

The parser reached an undefined state
